translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter with Kuṇḍadhāna
Kuṇḍadhāna’s Birth Story

analyzed: satta aham paṭisallīna  sayambhum agga puggala  pasanna cittaḥ sumanaḥ
translated: For seven days I attended on the Self-Made One, the Foremost Person,
with a confident mind and a happy mind.
Knowing the time had passed,

analyzed: padum uttaram mahā muni  mahantim kadalī kaṇṇi
translated: the Great Seer Padumuttara,
I approached, holding a large plantain leaf.
The Fortunate One, the All-Knowing One, the Leader of the World,🔽having accepted it, the Great Seer,
in order to satisfy my mind,
ate it.
After the Fully Awakened One, the peerless Caravan Leader,🔽had eaten,
while sitting on his seat,
he spoke these verses:
‘Those who are the guardians here,
the yakkhas on this mountain,
in the forest, the beings of the past and future,
listen to my words.
He who attended on the Buddha,
like a king of deer, like a lion,
I will praise him,

analyzed: suṇātha mama bhāsato  saḥ  devarājā bhavissati  catutisati khattum ca
translated: listen to my words.🔽For eleven times he will be a king of the gods,
and for thirty-four times a wheel-turning monarch.
For a hundred thousand aeons,

analyzed: okkāka kula sambhavaḥ  gotamaḥ nāma gottena
translated: born in the family of crows,🔽he will be a teacher in the world,
known as Gotama by clan.
Without reviling the ascetic,
the virtuous, the undefiled,
by the ripening of that evil deed,

analyzed: nāmadheyyam labhissati  tassa dhamme su dāyādaḥ
translated: he will get the name of crow.🔽The one who will be his heir in the Dhamma,
the one who is born from his breast,
known as Kuṇḍadhāna,
will be his disciple.’
I was devoted to solitude,
a meditator, delighting in meditation.
Having satisfied the Teacher,
I live undefiled.
Surrounded by my disciples,
with the Community of monks in front,
sitting in the Community of monks,
the Victor held up his robe.
Having put my robe over one shoulder,🔽and worshipping the Leader of the World,
in front of the best of speakers,
I was the first to take it up.
By that deed, Blessed One,
the one who shakes the ten-thousand worlds,
sitting in the Community of monks,
placed me in the foremost position.
My energy is the yoke-bearing beast,
the vehicle for attaining safety from bondage;
I bear this my last body,
in the Dispensation of the Fully Awakened One.
The four analytical insights,
and the eight liberations as well,
The six super-knowledges have been experienced,
the Buddha’s Dispensation has been done.”🔽Thus the venerable Kuṇḍadhāna recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā kuṇḍadhāno thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Kuṇḍadhānattherassāpadānaṁ paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā kuṇḍadhānaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽kuṇḍadhāna therassa apadānam paṭhama
translated: The first chapter of the Elders’ Verses is finished.
